text: How the 2008 Mumbai terrorist attacks inspired a film about the Taj Mahal Palace hotel and its staff--Dev Patel and director/co-writer Anthony Maras talk about the terrorists, the hotel, and their new film, "Hotel Mumbai": https://www.cnn.com/videos/tv/2019/03/17/exp-gps-0317-patel-maras-hotel-mumbai.cnn …

text:
Why has American life expectancy been declining for three years--the first time that's happened in a century?

@drsanjaygupta says stress is weighing on America's health. From his GPS interview: https://www.cnn.com/videos/tv/2019/03/17/exp-gps-0317-sanjay-gupta-one-nation-under-stress.cnn …
author: FareedZakaria

text:
What can Ukraine's elections tell us about Russian interference?

"There’s nothing that Russia will do to the U.S. that it won’t do to Ukraine first and worst," @JaredCohen says. From our GPS interview: https://www.cnn.com/videos/tv/2019/03/17/exp-gps-0317-cohen-sot-russia-ukraine.cnn …
author: FareedZakaria

text: Brexit "has driven a stake into the heart of parliamentary representative democracy," @DMiliband says. More from our GPS panel: https://www.cnn.com/videos/tv/2019/03/17/exp-gps-0317-miliband-sot-brexit.cnn …

text: The world order as we know it was built over two centuries, during the reigns of two liberal, Anglo superpowers--Britain and then the US. I wonder whether Brexit will mark the day that the West--as a political and strategic entity--began to crumble
author: FareedZakaria

text: Intellectually right, morally right
author: FareedZakaria

text:
Brexit would mark the end of Britain’s role as a great power, and I wonder whether it would also mark the day that the West, as a political and strategic entity, begins to crumble.

My latest column:
author: FareedZakaria

text: A reasonable suggestion from the FT: Seek a long delay to the March 29 deadline, start considering softer Brexit options, and hold a referendum if none of them passes
author: FareedZakaria

text: Thank YOU for all the work you do!
author: FareedZakaria

text:
Most Western countries are going to become more diverse. That is simply demographic reality. India demonstrates how that diversity—if embraced and celebrated—could actually help rescue and strengthen democracy.

My take: https://www.cnn.com/videos/tv/2019/03/09/exp-gps-0310-fareeds-take-diversity-democracy-india-us.cnn …

The greatest check on Pres. Trump has surely been the public itself, placing some limits on his behavior by voting in the midterms and expressing itself through opinion polls and protests.

text:
In Saudi Arabia, women have the status of children. By law, their husbands or fathers are their guardians. Some clerics give men a free hand--to beat women.
